nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't this still be an error? Also with this failure now you won't get the stack trace.

Exception trace would pop up every single test run with the test harness.  Since we're now making the test harness public, this is kind of an issue.
You don't need a stack trace for SocketException as the error message would be good enough and you could infer where the error was.
Maybe you should check the launch mode and just don't log anything if it is TEST, as it sounds like you will still get the WARN in tests now?
I just reverted this file.  Don't feel like arguing.
So there is always going to be a big stacktrace in the logs when running tests now?
For now.  I don't have time to update this PR as I'm working on something else at the moment. A contributor is working on Funqy so I'd like to get this PR in.
